statements: SELECT * FROM logistics_financial_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, revenue FROM logistics_financial_data WHERE revenue >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM logistics_financial_data WHERE expenses < 2000 AND shipping_cost > 50;
SELECT id, product_name, revenue, expenses FROM logistics_financial_data WHERE order_id = 100012;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price, revenue FROM logistics_financial_data WHERE quantity * unit_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM logistics_financial_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM logistics_financial_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM logistics_financial_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING num_orders > 10;
SELECT product_name, AVG(unit_price) AS avg_unit_price, AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue FROM logistics_financial_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses, (SUM(revenue) - SUM(expenses)) AS profit FROM logistics_financial_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM logistics_data;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM logistics_data ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, price FROM logistics_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT id, product_name, supplier_name, cost_price FROM financial_data WHERE profit_margin > 0.3 ORDER BY profit_margin DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > cost_price AND revenue > 50000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, supplier_name, quantity, price FROM logistics_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM logistics_data WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM logistics_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT MAX(quantity), MIN(quantity) FROM logistics_data WHERE product_name = 'Product X';
SELECT product_name, revenue, profit_margin FROM financial_data WHERE profit_margin > 0.2 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM logistics_information;
SELECT product_id, quantity, total_cost FROM logistics_information WHERE shipment_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT delivery_location, order_id FROM logistics_information ORDER BY delivery_location DESC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(transportation_cost) AS total_transportation_cost FROM supply_chain_costs GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount_paid, MIN(amount) AS min_amount_paid FROM financial_data WHERE status = 'PAID';
SELECT * FROM logistics_information WHERE order_id = 12345
SELECT shipment_date, delivery_location FROM logistics_information WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT product_id, SUM(total_cost) AS total_expense FROM logistics_information GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT order_id, transportation_cost + storage_cost + handling_cost AS total_supply_chain_cost FROM supply_chain_costs
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, quantity, destination_address FROM LogisticsInformation;
SELECT invoice_id, transaction_date, amount, currency FROM FinancialData;
SELECT cost_id, cost_type, cost_amount, description FROM SupplyChainCosts;
SELECT profit_id, revenue, expenditure, profit_margin FROM Profitability;
SELECT * FROM LogisticsInformation;
SELECT * FROM LogisticsInformation WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity, destination_address FROM LogisticsInformation WHERE shipment_id = 1001;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, destination_address, quantity FROM LogisticsInformation WHERE product_name LIKE 'Product%';
SELECT invoice_id, transaction_date, amount, currency FROM FinancialData WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT profit_id, revenue, expenditure, profit_margin FROM Profitability WHERE profit_margin < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM logistics_info;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM logistics_info WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT entry_id, cost_type, cost_amount FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_type = 'Shipping';
SELECT entry_id, revenue, expenses, profit FROM profitability WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_id ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM logistics_info WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT cost_type, cost_amount FROM supply_chain_costs WHERE cost_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY cost_id DESC
SELECT revenue, expenses, profit FROM profitability WHERE profit > 0 AND expenses < revenue ORDER BY profit DESC
SELECT summary_id, total_cost, net_profit FROM supply_chain_summary WHERE entry_id = 25 ORDER BY total_cost ASC
